grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 爪牙【ソウガ】claws and fangs, claws and tusks, clutches, devious design, means of causing harm, weapon, pawn, stooge, cat's-paw, right-hand man
爪繞【ソウニョウ】kanji "claw" radical at left
陥入爪【カンニュウソウ】ingrown nail, ingrowing nail
kun reading compounds: 爪【つめ】nail (e.g. fingernail, toenail), claw, talon, hoof, plectrum, pick, hook, clasp
陥入爪【かんにゅうそう】ingrown nail, ingrowing nail
鷹の爪【たかのつめ】Gamblea innovans (species of deciduous tree), extremely spicy form of chili pepper, variety of high-quality green tea
